Title: WPF Encryption
Description: This develop a application for encryption/encode a string or checksum a file
HomeWiki:
WPF Encryption and Checksum

This develop a application for encryption/encode a string or checksum a file. 

Major Features:

  • Support of 12 well-known and documented hash and checksum algorithms:  MD4, MD5, SHA-1, SHA-2( 256, 384) CRC32, NTLM.

  • Support of a custom hash algorithm (Encode-based) used in SHA-1 and MD5 applications.

  • Support of 2 input data formats: files and text strings.

  • Work with large size files.

  • Calculates hash/checksum  for files of any type: music, audio, sound, video, image, icon, text, compression, etc., with the extensions: .mp3, .wav, .avi, .mpg, .midi, .mov, .dvd, .ram, .zip, .rar, .ico, .gif, .pif, .pic, .tif, .tiff, .txt, .doc, .pdf, .wps, .dat, .dll, .hex, .bin, .iso, .cpp, .dss, .par, .pps, .cue, .ram, .md5, .sfv, etc

  • Enable drop file into windows to checksum
